reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at this hotel for one night just last week. It was absolutely, a fantastic hotel. We were so impressed. We travel a lot and this hotel totally iwas just amazing. The staff was so kind and helpful, even letting us stay past checkout because we had a later afternoon bus to catch. And the rooms were just beautiful. We had a balcony overlooking the city walls. Sitting out there, enjoying our free welcome cocktail was just heavenly. The location is perfect - right in the walled city. We dined at the hotel restaurant and found that to be just perfect as well. A very good sophisticated meal in a beautful dining room. And the breakfast was great as well. This was a truly perfect stay. We heartily recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Incredibly Wonderful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a real find and on balance a better option than the pousada. It took a while to find the inn but when we did we were given a really warm welcome and were delighted with lovely rooms overlooking the castle walls (quite literally) and the courtyard below where we had dinner later in the evening.
reviews.title: Beautiful inn

likes.disliked: — Rooms on the higher of the two floors are better

reviews.text: Rooms are tasteful and bathrooms well equipped. We were pleased to be on the higher floor where each room had a small open terrace, rather than on the lower floor which gave onto the restaurant courtyard. Air conditioning was efficient. Fresh fruit, the local speciality cherry brandy and chocolates were replenished every day.
reviews.title: Very comfortable-great option if you can't get into the pousada

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is really nice and located within the ancient town walls. Rooms are Ok, rather small but have a cosy terrace. Staff was very friendly and forthcoming.
reviews.title: Lovely place in a lovely town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is a bit of a headache to drive the car up to the hotel (the wall gates are very small and an SUV would not pass) but there is a large car park just outside the walls as well.
reviews.title: Charming Hotel In Beautiful Village

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although there a quite some restaurants in the old town, the range and quality of dining options is disappointing compared to general quality of food in Portugal (we did not dine in the hotel restaurant).
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definitely recommend this hotel to other people.
reviews.title: What charming village!
Great Stay In Obidos
reviews.text: Stayed at Casa das Senhoras Rainhas on last two days of August 07.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wonderful accommodation and hospitality at this delightful boutique hotel located within the walled town of Obidos. The room was spotlessly clean and tastefully furnished.Our room had a small balcony which added to its charm and we enjoyed sitting there surrounded by the ambience of this Queens Town. Friendly,helpful staff go out of their way to make you feel welcome and special touches such as the fruit bowl,chocolate cake and Port wine set the tone for a truely memorable experience. We had breakfast in the restaurant and it was exquisite - freshly prepared and superbly presented(we regretted not having dinner here the previous night!)
reviews.title: Portuguese Highlight

likes.disliked: — Lack of signage for entry into city walls.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A tip for those of you travelling by car the entry into the city walls is not clearly marked and very narrow - a phone call to the hotel reception before negotiating around city walls will ease the stress!
reviews.title: Fabulous personal hotel with lovely restaurant

likes.liked: — The room, location and the restaurant
likes.disliked: — Trying to drive the hire car into the arch in the walls to get it into Obidos to park it by the hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed four nights, eating in the restaurant for two of them.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel in Obidos, don't eat in the Restaurant.

likes.disliked: — Noisy extraction unit and the food in the restaurant.

reviews.text: Our tower room was large, nicely decorated, with a good bathroom & views over the walls & also up the lane opposite the hotel.
reviews.title: A Jewel in the Queens' City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Every day you are given fresh fruit, local cherry liqueur, & chocolate cup-cakes in the room.
